description.text: Contains the nameplate information attached to the product

value.text: Roadshow demonstrator to demonstrate plug and produce and remote control in context of factory-x.

description.text: Note: this set of information is defined by SMT drop-in "Address Information"

enumeration: 0173-1#07-AAS927#001 (administrativ contact), 0173-1#07-AAS928#001 (commercial contact), 0173-1#07-AAS929#001 (other contact), 0173-1#07-AAS930#001 (hazardous goods contact), 0173-1#07-AAS931#001 (technical contact). Note: the above mentioned ECLASS enumeration should be declared as “open” for further addition. ECLASS enumeration IRDI is preferable. If no IRDI available, custom input as String may also be accepted.

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61360_4#ADA005#001 country code. country codes defined accord. to DIN EN ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. Mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC. Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
Note: language codes defined accord. to ISO 639-1. Note: as per ECLASS definition, Expression and representation of thoughts, information, feelings, ideas through characters.
Note: notation accord. to ISO 8601 Note: for time in UTC the zone designator “Z” is to be used
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA129#001 city/town. Mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.

Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.

Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA286#001 street. Mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA281#001 ZIP/Postal code. Mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC. Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
